treatment.description: Aerial stems persisting for 1 year or less, with stomates on surfaces scattered or in bands on each side of valleys. Branches in regular whorls, except for unbranched forms of Equisetum fluviatile and E . palustre and brown fertile stems of dimorphic species. Cones rounded at apex.
